channel.title: IoT, Meetup on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in IoT, Meetup on David G. Simmons

item.title: NCRIoT Meetup
item.description: If you follow me on Twitter, you’ll already know that I was at the NCRIoT IoT Meetup yesterday at the NASCAR Hall of Fame in Charlotte, NC. You may not know what NC RIoT is. Hell, until recently, I didn’t either, which is a crime really because it’s an amazing group of IoT fanatics doing some really cool stuff with IoT. I even met a guy who does as many crazy things with IoT as I do – you should follow @LogicalDan on twitter, and tweet at him in case he’s wearing his shirt that lights up when you tweet at him.
